Actions.Name: Overpower
Actions.AreaEffect: All foes adjacent to the target take 2 damage.

Actions.Name: Strike
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe must save or become dazed. Dazed foes take [fray] damage.

Actions.Name: Death March
Actions.Description: The Wight and all adjacent allies may move 1 space in the same direction, ignoring engagement, then each may deal 2 damage to an adjacent foe.

Actions.Name: Formation
Actions.Description: Shove all allies in range 2 1 space towards this character.
